mapper.insert: insert into sys_rule_factor_param (param_name, item_code, item_name, status, remark, save_object, save_field, update_status, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat) values (#{paramName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saveObject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saveField,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sys_rule_factor_param set item_name = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, save_object = #{saveObject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, save_field = #{saveField,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_status = #{updateStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where param_name = #{paramName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and item_code = #{itemCode,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select param_name, item_code, item_name, status, remark, save_object, save_field, update_status, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from sys_rule_factor_param

select param_name, item_code, item_name, status, remark, save_object, save_field, update_status, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from sys_rule_factor_param where rec_stat='0'

select param_name, item_code, item_name, status, remark, save_object, save_field, update_status, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from sys_rule_factor_param where 1=1
and instr(param_name,#{paramName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) > 0
and instr(item_code,#{item_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) > 0
and item_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{itemName}),'%')
and status like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{status}),'%')
and remark like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{remark}),'%')
and save_object like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{saveObject}),'%')
and save_field like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{saveField}),'%')
and rec_stat like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{recStat}),'%')
